name: Update Database Schema Docs
description: Updates database schema documentation when SQL migrations are created or modified

then.prompt:
A new database migration was created. Please:
1. Review the migration SQL
2. Update .kiro/steering/database-schema.md to reflect the changes
3. Document any new tables, columns, indexes, or RLS policies
4. Add TypeScript type examples if new tables were created
5. Update common query patterns if relevant
